ModuleInfo.Description: This tool loads Screenlines from a shapefile and then determineswhich links intersect the screenline's geometry. This tool then exports the volume crossing each element of the screenline and in each direction on that link into a CSV file. The shapefile's attribute table must contain fields labeled 'Id', 'Descr' 'PosDirName' and 'NegDirName'. Results are written to a text file. Results will only be reported for the modes selected by the user.
ModuleInfo.Name: Report Screenline Results
